name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas - Collection pack 2
summary: Enhance your adventure and achieve victory with the Collection Pack 2. Complete your collection with new starships, pilots and weapons. The Collection Pack 2 includes the digital version of : - Skullscream Starship Pack - Vigilance Starship Pack - Vantage Starship Pack - Startail Pilot Pack - Haywire Pilot Pack - Gauss Gun Weapon Pack -...
